Novel. Normal: [(ATTTT)7–400] Pathogenic: [(ATTTT)60–79(ATTTC)31–75(ATTTT)58–90], ATTTC within (ATTTT)7–400 repeat region

Two genes span the CTG/CAG repeat and are expressed in opposite directions: ATXN8, which encodes a nearly pure polyglutamine expansion protein in the CAG direction, and ATXN8OS (603680), which, when transcribed, produces a noncoding CUG expansion RNA (Moseley et al., 2006).
